fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations Sydney: £563 Asiana Airlines from Heathrow via Seoul. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay four days, maximum three months. Trailfinders (020-7937 3939, trailfinders.com). Hong Kong: £297 British Airways from Heathrow. Must be booked by January 27. Full payment required when booking. Valid for departures February 3-March 17. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one year. Airline Network (0870 2349912, airlinenetwork.co.uk). New York: £187 United Airlines from Heathrow. Must be booked by January 27. Valid for departures until March 26. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Travelbag (0870 8901459, travelbag.co.uk). Los Angeles: £251 Lufthansa from Manchester via Munich. Must be booked by March 31. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (08701 111111, thomascook.com). Amsterdam: £49 Basiq Air from Stansted. Must be booked online (€10 extra if booked by phone 020-7365 4997). Basiq Air (basiqair.com). Paris: £79.70 British Airways from Birmingham. Must be booked online (£15 extra if booked by phone 0870 8509850). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum 12 months. British Airways (ba.com). The pick of the rest Auckland: £519 Air New Zealand from Heathrow via Los Angeles. Must be booked by February 10. Valid for departures April 15-June 16. Minimum stay seven days, maximum 180 days. Quest Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Rome: £90 Alitalia from Heathrow. Must be booked by January 27. No minimum stay, maximum one year. Alitalia (0870 6076005, alitalia.co.uk). Havana: £426 Iberia from Heathrow or Manchester via Madrid. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay seven days, maximum one month. Journey Latin America (020-8747 3108, journeylatinamerica.co.uk). Madrid: £59.90 BMI British Midland from Heathrow. Must be booked online (£10 extra if booked by phone 0870 6070555). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. BMI British Midland (flybmi.com). And the rail alternative Paris, Brussels: £59. Lille: £55 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford. Must be booked at least 21 days before departure. No advance booking required for Saturday or Sunday same-day returns or trips including a Saturday-night stay. Eurostar (08705 186186, eurostar.com). NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush.
